about_the_game:
Soda Splash is the first game created by our two-person team. As a new team, 『CliCli』 is an efficient game editing tool that has helped us significantly in our development. We welcome your feedback and suggestions to help us improve!

**Game features**

Dive into an exhilarating multiplayer co-op survival PvP game! Unleash your strength, agility, and intelligence to crush your soda cans, and flood the enemy with theirs!

Choose your favorite character and let destiny decide your skills! Strategically utilize life springs and the shop to gather resources, grow stronger, and stay on your toes to avoid being surrounded.

Team up to wipe out the soda cans—going solo will only leave you vulnerable! Stock up on gear, and with seamless teamwork, achieve an epic victory!

short_description: Soda Splash is a multiplayer co-op survival PVP game made with a game editing tool『CliCli』. Players team up to defeat soda cans and gather resources to enhance their characters. Work strategically to increase the rival’s soda cans for the victory!
